reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 349/07: ONTARIO FINANCING AUTHORITY: PRESCRIBED CLASSES OF PUBLIC SERVANT
reg_info.reg_name_text: Ontario Financing authority: prescribed classes of public servant
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 349/07: ONTARIO FINANCING AUTHORITY: PRESCRIBED CLASSES OF PUBLIC SERVANT

content.content: 1. For the purposes of subsections 8 (7) and (8) of the Act, each of the following classes of positions for public servants that is created under subsection 33 (1) of the Public Service of Ontario Act, 2006 is prescribed: 1. A position that is classified under subsection 33 (1) of that Act as AOFA 1, AOFA 2 or AOFA 3. 2. A position that is classified under subsection 33 (1) of that Act as XOFA 1, XOFA 2 or XOFA 3.  O. Reg. 349/07, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. For the purposes of subsections 8 (7) and (8) of the Act, each of the following classes of positions for public servants that is created under subsection 33 (1) of the Public Service of Ontario Act, 2006 is prescribed:

1. A position that is classified under subsection 33 (1) of that Act as AOFA 1, AOFA 2 or AOFA 3.

2. A position that is classified under subsection 33 (1) of that Act as XOFA 1, XOFA 2 or XOFA 3.  O. Reg. 349/07, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 349/07, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 349/07, s. 2.
